medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset of diffuse abdominal pain, nausea, and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began at lunch yesterday with poor appetite and nausea that worsened throughout the day, followed by acute onset abdominal pain in the epigastrium radiating to the back in the evening. The patient also experienced two episodes of non-bloody emesis.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension (HTN), Hyperlipidemia (HL), Type II Diabetes Mellitus (DMII), Coronary Artery Disease (CAD) status post Coronary Artery Bypass Grafting (CABG), Atrial Fibrillation on Coumadin, possible Congestive Heart Failure (- CHF) with EF 45%, Glaucoma, elevated PSA with high-grade intraepithelial neoplasm.
medical_history.family_history: Significant for coronary artery disease and Type II diabetes.
